eigenvalues, eigenvectors = torch.eig(matrix, True)
RuntimeError: Attempt to access Storage having data type Char as data type Float

eigenvalues, eigenvectors = torch.eig(matrix, True)
RuntimeError: Attempt to access Storage having data type UNKNOWN_SCALAR as data type Float

body:
I also sometimes get the following errors instead:
```
eigenvalues, eigenvectors = torch.eig(matrix, True)
RuntimeError: Attempt to access Storage having data type Char as data type Float
```

```
eigenvalues, eigenvectors = torch.eig(matrix, True)
RuntimeError: Attempt to access Storage having data type UNKNOWN_SCALAR as data type Float
```
